content:
From: Martin Desharnais <martin.desharnais@posteo.de>
Dear Isabelle developers,

I don't know who is responsible, but the web interface to testboard [1] (or
other CI projects for that matter) seems to be down.

Regards,
Martin

[1]: https://ci.isabelle.systems/jenkins/job/testboard/

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev

From: Fabian Huch <huch@in.tum.de>
Thanks for letting us know. The Jenkins master node crashed, but is now
back online.

Fabian

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
